name: route-multi
description:
The route-multi command calculates routes visiting multiple waypoints in sequence. Useful for:

- Delivery route planning
- Multi-stop trip planning
- Tour routes
- Sequential location visits

Calculates each leg separately and provides total statistics.

options.-m, --mode: Travel mode: walk, bike, drive (default: drive)
options.-f, --format: Output format: text, geojson, json (default: text)

output:
Multi-waypoint route with:
- Per-leg distance and time
- Total distance and time
- Route geometry through all waypoints
- Waypoint markers
